system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.CbH9UMxgrmEr8tFh]{Personal Plasmas Proficiency}

Benefits

The character can perform gridshot attacks at a -3 penalty, and when performing a waveshot attack the Reflex Saving Throw TN is increased to [TN15].

Normal

Characters without this feat take a -6 attack penalty when attempting a gridshot attack, and when performing a waveshot attack the Reflex Saving Throw TN is [TN9]
system.summary: Reduced gridshot penalty, TN 15 waveshot reflex save
